choosePlan.other: Choose Plan to Fit Your Needs

saveAnnually.other: Save up to 43% on annual plans!

premiumPlanFeatures.other: All features of the Premium plan

termsOfServiceAgreement.other: By uploading your files or using our service you agree with our

upgradeDowngradeQuestion.other: What if I want to upgrade or downgrade my subscription?

upgradeDowngradeAnswer.other: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. To upgrade or downgrade your subscription, please contact our support team.

subscriptionPlanQuestion.other: Which Subscription Plan fits my needs?

subscriptionPlanAnswer.other: In order to test the API and get an idea of the product, you can simply sign up for the Free plan. If you need some of the features of the paid plans after that, you can easily upgrade to the Premium plan for only $7 per month or a 43% discount (if you choose to pay annually), or you can contact us for the Business plan.

annualPaymentAnswer.other: Yes. If you choose annual billing, the total price of your Subscription Plan will be 43% lower than the total amount you would pay with a monthly payment frequency.

technicalSupportQuestion.other: Can I receive technical support when I'm evaluating?

technicalSupportAnswer.other: Yes! Our support teams will be glad to assist. We want to ensure there are no bad surprises after you begin using the product. We provide an online forum that is maintained by our highly trained development staff. Whether you have already purchased or are still evaluating we will always provide timely, helpful assistance.

planRenewalQuestion.other: Is my monthly/yearly plan automatically renewed?

planRenewalAnswer.other: Yes, the premium plans are subscription-based and will be automatically renewed.

creditCardDetailsQuestion.other: Do I need to enter credit card details to evaluate?

creditCardDetailsAnswer.other: No, you can use the free plan without entering your credit card details.
